response.original_title: Bahkan Di Ujung Waktu Pun, Segelintir Cahaya Akan Menyentuhmu
response.overview: Surya, a 20-year-old drug addict, felt anxious on the final day of his rehabilitation. The urge to use illegal drugs still loomed large within him, making him reflect on his former life as an addict and feel fearful and anxious about his uncertain future. Until hope arrived and took him boldly into a new life.
response.tagline: You can't hide from what hurts
response.title: Bahkan Di Ujung Waktu Pun, Segelintir Cahaya Akan Menyentuhmu
